channel.title: CVE Feed for wpchill -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpchill -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6491|2024-06-07T05:33:46.516Z -- wpchill -- strong%20testimonials
item.description: The Strong Testimonials plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to an improper capability check on the wpmtst_save_view_sticky function in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to modify favorite views.

item.title: CVE-2024-3269|2024-05-30T03:34:29.217Z -- wpchill -- download%20monitor
item.description: The Download Monitor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access to functionality due to a missing capability check on the dlm_uninstall_plugin function in all versions up to, and including, 4.9.13. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to uninstall the plugin and delete its data.

item.title: CVE-2023-6491|2024-06-07T14:52:06.518Z -- wpchill -- strong%20testimonials
item.description: The Strong Testimonials plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to an improper capability check on the wpmtst_save_view_sticky function in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to modify favorite views.
